contentrichtext.text: '''Vatche Hovsepian''' (sometimes credited as '''Vatche Housepian''') is a [[duduk]] player. With Antranik Askarian, he performed the duduk parts on "The Feeling Begins," the first track of Peter Gabriel's ''[[Passion: Music for The Last Temptation of Christ|Passion]]'', the soundtrack album from Martin Scorsese's film ''[[The Last Temptation of Christ (film)|The Last Temptation of Christ]]''. The duduk recording is actually an excerpt from a song titled "The Wind Subsides," originally recorded for a collection of [[Music of Armenia|Armenian music]] released by [[Radio France]]'s [[Ocora]] label. ==External links== * [http://armeniansound.net/Vatche-Hovsepian-Duduk/ Vatche Hovsepian Armenian Sound Network] {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Hovsepian, Vatche | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = | DATE OF BIRTH = | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Hovsepian, Vatche}} [[Category:Armenian musicians]] [[Category:Woodwind musicians]] [[Category:Living people]] {{Armenia-musician-stub}} {{woodwind-musician-stub}}
